entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:32 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 3.

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
